title: CCleaner v5.27
text:
The Piriform team are happy to announce the latest release of CCleaner for Windows.
CCleaner v5.27 brings improved cleaning across Chrome, Firefox and Opera, along with improvements across the application. A list of changes can be found in the change log below.
Change log:
Improved Firefox and Chrome cleaning Improved Opera Beta cleaning Improved Windows 10 support Improved Uninstall tool version sorting Updated internal architecture Added Foxit Reader 8.0 cleaning Minor GUI improvements Minor bug fixes Download now! 
You can download our free version here 
Fancy a few more features? Trial the CCleaner Professional version here 
If you are already a CCleaner Professional user your installation will update automatically.
Free newsletter: 
If you haven't done so already, you can sign up to receive selected email communications, including news, product updates, case studies and special announcements, here.
